long_description: The Avid Shorty Ultimate cantilever brake boasts a host of user-friendly features, including an inline barrel adjuster, cable quick-release and easy setup. CNC-machined arms reduce weight while the open design promotes mud clearance. Height-adjustable, center-mount pads and concentric hardware make for easy setup; front or rear brake can be switched between narrow or wide stances. Brake includes alloy straddle carrier with cable, road-style replaceable cartridge brake pads and an inline barrel adjuster for on-the-fly adjustments. Center-pull design of the Avid Shorty Ultimate cantilever brake is recommended for short-pull mountain or drop bar road levers (not for long-pull, linear-brake levers). Cable quick-release opens the brake up for fast, hassle-free wheel removal or replacement. Please choose between either front or rear brake; not sold as a set.
